Module Description¶

The api can be found in the templated_yaml.api module.

templated_yaml.api.render_from_path(path, context=None, globals=None)¶

Renders a templated yaml document from file path.

Parameters

  • path – A path to the yaml file to process.

  • context – A context to overlay on the yaml file. This will override any yaml values.

  • globals – A dictionary of globally-accessible objects within the rendered template.

Returns

A dict with the final overlayed configuration.

templated_yaml.api.render_from_string(content, context=None, globals=None)¶

Renders a templated yaml document from a string.

Parameters

  • content – The yaml string to evaluate.

  • context – A context to overlay on the yaml file. This will override any yaml values.

  • globals – A dictionary of globally-accessible objects within the rendered template.

Returns

A dict with the final overlayed configuration.
